title: Strategy for Utilizing LMS Tools in Large-Scale Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and experience accessing online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens participating in a language education program operated by a public institution, with the goal of enhancing digital educational competencies through project-based experiences using various LMS tools

learning_goals: Can establish a language learning project plan utilizing basic LMS functionalities
Can collect and interpret learner engagement data using LMS analytics tools
Can compare various LMS integration features and develop a tool-selection strategy aligned with educational objectives
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
